ygData.subject: I hate to burst your bubble
ygData.msgSnippet: I hate to burst your bubble, but voting doesn t start until Monday, May 5. The deadline for offering submissions was Wednesday, April 30.  I sent a reminder

I hate to burst your bubble, but voting doesn't start until Monday, 
May 5.

The deadline for offering submissions was Wednesday, April 30.  I sent 
a reminder message on Tuesday, April 29.
